_sText:
De_monte

Map by kaka

Nav file by chizbone

In a almost completely abandoned village...

A mining company linked with the mafia believes the area under the village to be a big mining prospect. But a few of the locals refuse to sell there land.
The company decides to hire terrorists to try to scare the last remaing villagers off by blowing up one of the village's two statues. 
The police gets a tip of the attempt and arrives at the same time...


My focus was on the maps gameplay. I wanted to make a map that are both well balanced and fun to play.

UPDATE
new and improved nav file thanks to chizbone
